title: Apple and mincemeat pie
ingredients: ['4 apples - peeled, cored and chopped', '2 tablespoons butter', '2 teaspoons lemon juice', '100g caster sugar', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/8 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1 1/2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '450g prepared mincemeat', '125g chopped walnuts (optional)', 'shortcrust pastry for 2 layered pie', '1 egg yolk', '1 tablespoon water']
